buttonDefaultTitle.description: Hover on the Talkie button, dynamically set.
buttonDefaultTitle.original: Read text selection out loud with $NAME$
buttonDefaultTitle.translated-from: Read text selection out loud with $NAME$

extensionDescription_Free.description: For the browsers/web stores. Maximum 132 characters.
extensionDescription_Free.message: KOSTNADSFRITT! Snabb, enkel, kvalitativ text till tal för över 40 språk. Läs högt från webbplatser, PDF, email. Prata med TTS.
extensionDescription_Free.original: FREE! Fast, easy, high-quality text to speech in over 40 languages. Read out loud from websites, PDF, email. Speak text with TTS.
extensionDescription_Free.translated-from: FREE! Fast, easy, high-quality text to speech in over 40 languages. Read out loud from websites, PDF, email. Speak text with TTS.

extensionDescription_Premium.description: For the browsers/web stores. Maximum 132 characters.
extensionDescription_Premium.message: PREMIUM! Snabb, enkel, kvalitativ text till tal för över 40 språk. Läs högt från webbplatser, PDF, email. Prata med TTS.
extensionDescription_Premium.original: PREMIUM! Fast, easy, high-quality text to speech in over 40 languages. Read out loud from websites, PDF, email. Speak text with TTS.
extensionDescription_Premium.translated-from: PREMIUM! Fast, easy, high-quality text to speech in over 40 languages. Read out loud from websites, PDF, email. Speak text with TTS.

frontend_featuresFree_List03.message: Läser upp markerad text genom en knapptryckning, kortkommando, eller högerklicksmeny.
frontend_featuresFree_List03.original: Reads selected text by a button click, shortcut key, or right-click menu.
frontend_featuresFree_List03.translated-from: Reads selected text by a button click, shortcut key, or right-click menu.

frontend_featuresFree_List04.message: Läser långa texter och artiklar högt, även när fliken är i bakgrunden.
frontend_featuresFree_List04.original: Reads long texts and articles out loud, even while the tab is in the background.
frontend_featuresFree_List04.translated-from: Reads long texts and articles out loud, even while the tab is in the background.

frontend_featuresFree_List05.message: Öppen källkod som finns tillgänglig kostnadsfritt för alla användare.
frontend_featuresFree_List05.original: Code is open source and available for free to all users.
frontend_featuresFree_List05.translated-from: Code is open source and available for free to all users.

frontend_featuresPremium_List01.message: Välj egen standardröst för varje språk. Bra om du tröttnat på systemrösten!
frontend_featuresPremium_List01.original: Choose your own default voice for each language. Great if you get tired of the system voice!
frontend_featuresPremium_List01.translated-from: Choose your own default voice for each language. Great if you get tired of the system voice!

frontend_featuresPremium_List02.message: Välj läshastigheten och tonhöjd per röst. Justera röster för att passa dig!
frontend_featuresPremium_List02.original: Choose reading speed and pitch per voice. Adjust voices to your liking!
frontend_featuresPremium_List02.translated-from: Choose reading speed and pitch per voice. Adjust voices to your liking!

frontend_featuresPremium_List03.message: Det varma, sprudlande känslan man får när genom att stödja öppen källkod skriven av oberoende utvecklare.
frontend_featuresPremium_List03.original: That warm, fuzzy feeling you get when supporting open source software by independent developers.
frontend_featuresPremium_List03.translated-from: That warm, fuzzy feeling you get when supporting open source software by independent developers.

frontend_featuresPremium_List04.message: Överkomligt pris. Framtida Premium-uppdateringar ingår kostnadsfritt.
frontend_featuresPremium_List04.original: Future Premium updates included for free.
frontend_featuresPremium_List04.translated-from: Future Premium updates included for free.

frontend_featuresVersion_Free.message: För närvarande används den konstnadsfria versionen av Talkie och tillgänglig funktionalitet är begränsad. Kanske skulle Talkie Premium vara ett bättre val för dig?
frontend_featuresVersion_Free.original: Currently using the free version of Talkie, and a limited set of features is available. Perhaps Talkie Premium would be a better choice for you?
frontend_featuresVersion_Free.translated-from: Currently using the free version of Talkie, and a limited set of features is available. Perhaps Talkie Premium would be a better choice for you?

frontend_featuresVersion_Premium.message: För närvarande används premiumversionen av Talkie och all funktionalitet är tillgänglig. Tack så mycket, det värmer mitt hjärta!
frontend_featuresVersion_Premium.original: Currently using the Talkie Premium, and all features are available. Thank you very much, it warms my heart!
frontend_featuresVersion_Premium.translated-from: Currently using the Talkie Premium, and all features are available. Thank you very much, it warms my heart!

frontend_featuresVersions.message: Talkie finns i två versioner: Talkie och Talkie Premium. Den konstnadsfria versionen fungerar bra för de flesta användningsfall, men premiumversionen har fler inställningar.
frontend_featuresVersions.original: Talkie comes in two versions: Talkie and Talkie Premium. The free version is great for most use cases, but the premium version offers additional options.
frontend_featuresVersions.translated-from: Talkie comes in two versions: Talkie and Talkie Premium. The free version is great for most use cases, but the premium version offers additional options.

frontend_licenseCLADescription.message: Alla bidrag till Talkie görs med tillstånd av Contributor License Agreement (CLA).
frontend_licenseCLADescription.original: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).
frontend_licenseCLADescription.translated-from: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie utvecklades ett par dagar före nyår 2016-2017, på utmaning av en kompis. Utmaningen började med frågan: under pendlingen till jobbet, är det möjligt att lyssna på en artikel istället för att läsa den? Lätt som en plätt, sa jag, och satte igång med att bevisa det — eller i alla fall att få min webbläsare att läsa upp text med en knasig röst. Den grundläggande versionen, utan något användargränssnitt, visade sig vara trivial att skapa. Att lägga till ett användargränssnitt tog längre tid. Att lägga till ordentlig språkdetektering krävde en drös mer kod. Att bemästra buggar i webbläsaren ännu mer jobb. Listan på förbättringar och nyttigheter växer — och ett par tusen rader kod senare, ser du resultatet.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it — or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on — and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.
frontend_storyDescription.translated-from: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it — or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on — and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyThankYou.message: Tack för att du använder Talkie — om du gillar det, berätta för dina vänner!
frontend_storyThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie — if you like it, tell your friends!
frontend_storyThankYou.translated-from: Thank you for using Talkie — if you like it, tell your friends!

frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.message: Du kan även markera text, högerklicka på den, och välja Talkie i menyn. Sättet fungerar också i PDF-filer och vissa typer av speciella sidor i Chrome.
frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.original: You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in the browser.
frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.translated-from: You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in the browser.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.message: Om kortkommandot inte fungerar, kontrollera att det inte redan används av något annat tillägg eller program.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.original: If the shortcut key does not work, please check that it is not already in use by another extension or program.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.translated-from: If the shortcut key does not work, please check that it is not already in use by another extension or program.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.original: Check or change the Talkie shortcut keys.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.translated-from: Check or change the Talkie shortcut keys.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.message: Ett bekvämt sätt är att använda Talkie-kortkommandot:
frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.original: A convenient option is to use the Talkie shortcut keys:
frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.translated-from: A convenient option is to use the Talkie shortcut keys:

frontend_usageStep01.message: Markera önskad text på valfri webbplats.
frontend_usageStep01.original: Select desired text on any web page.
frontend_usageStep01.translated-from: Select desired text on any web page.

frontend_usageStep02.message: Klicka på Talkie-knappen i din webbläsares verktygsfält
frontend_usageStep02.original: Click the Talkie button in your browser bar
frontend_usageStep02.translated-from: Click the Talkie button in your browser bar

frontend_voicesDescription.message: Se och testa installerade röster för varje språk i din webbläsare. Talkie Premium-användare kan även välja sin favoritröst per språk, samt läshastighet och tonhöj för varje röst.
frontend_voicesDescription.original: See and test installed voices for each language in your browser. Talkie Premium users can also select their favorite voice as the default per language, as well as set speed and pitch for each voice.
frontend_voicesDescription.translated-from: See and test installed voices for each language in your browser. Talkie Premium users can also select their favorite voice as the default per language, as well as set speed and pitch for each voice.

frontend_voicesPitchEmptyHeading.description: The per-voice pitch options heading, without the voice name variable as none has been selected

frontend_voicesPitchHeading.description: The per-voice pitch options heading, including the voice name

frontend_voicesRateEmptyHeading.description: The per-voice speed options heading, without the voice name variable as none has been selected

frontend_voicesRateHeading.description: The per-voice speed options heading, including the voice name

frontend_voicesSampleText.description: The original sentence is a popuplar English pangram. Translators are encouraged to use pangrams in their own languages. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pangram
frontend_voicesSampleText.message: Flygande bäckasiner söka hwila på mjuka tuvor.
frontend_voicesSampleText.original: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
frontend_voicesSampleText.translated-from: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

frontend_voicesSampleTextHeading.message: Exempeltext för Talkie att läsa upp
frontend_voicesSampleTextHeading.original: Sample text for Talkie to read out loud
frontend_voicesSampleTextHeading.translated-from: Sample text for Talkie to read out loud

frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageEmptySelecti.description: This should be the same/similar format as frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDefault, but without the variables.
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageEmptySelecti.original: Use as default voice for language
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageEmptySelecti.translated-from: Use as default voice for language

frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.description: The $LANGUAGE$ is the name (or ISO 639 code such as sv or sv-SE) of the language, the $VOICE$ the name of the voice
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.message: Använd $VOICE$ som standardröst för text på $LANGUAGE$
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.original: Use $VOICE$ as default voice for text in $LANGUAGE$
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.translated-from: Use $VOICE$ as default voice for text in $LANGUAGE$

noTextSelectedMessage.message: Vänligen markera önskad text först. Du kan även markera text, sedan högerklicka på den, och välja Talkie i menyn.
noTextSelectedMessage.original: Please select desired text on the website first. You can also select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu.
noTextSelectedMessage.translated-from: Please select desired text on the website first. You can also select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu.

notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.description: Some tabs can't be accessed by WebExtensions, such as chrome:// and the Chrome Web Store/Firefox Add-ons. This message warns users.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.message: Talkie kan inte komma åt den markerade texten från denna typ av sida. Det är en mycket speciell sida, och det finns säkerhetsbegränsningar i webbläsaren. Du kan även testa att markera text, sedan högerklicka på den, och välja Talkie i menyn. Jag ber om ursäkt för besväret.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.original: Talkie cannot access the selected text from this type of page. It is a very special page, and there are security limitations put in by the browser. You can also try to select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.translated-from: Talkie cannot access the selected text from this type of page. It is a very special page, and there are security limitations put in by the browser. You can also try to select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.message: Jag är ledsen, men läsning av text från Urklipp är en funktion i Talkie Premium. Har du övervägt att uppgradera?
readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.original: I'm sorry, but reading text from the clipboard is a Talkie Premium feature. Have you considered upgrading?
readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.translated-from: I'm sorry, but reading text from the clipboard is a Talkie Premium feature. Have you considered upgrading?

readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.message: Jag är ledsen, men den här webbläsaren stöder inte läsning från Urklipp. Inte än, åtminstone. Försök igen om en månad eller så!
readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.original: I'm sorry, but this web browser does not support reading from the clipboard. Not yet, at least. Please try again in one month or so!
readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.translated-from: I'm sorry, but this web browser does not support reading from the clipboard. Not yet, at least. Please try again in one month or so!

readClipboardNeedsPermission.message: Talkie har inte behörighet att komma åt ur Urklipp. Det är okej, men då kommer funktionen läsa text från Urklipp inte att fungera.
readClipboardNeedsPermission.original: Talkie does not have permission to access from the clipboard. That's ok, but then reading the clipboard text won't work.
readClipboardNeedsPermission.translated-from: Talkie does not have permission to access from the clipboard. That's ok, but then reading the clipboard text won't work.

readClipboardNoSuitableText.message: Det gick inte att hitta lämplig text i Urklippet. Kan du försöka kopiera något annat?
readClipboardNoSuitableText.original: Could not find suitable text in the clipboard. Can you try copying something else?
readClipboardNoSuitableText.translated-from: Could not find suitable text in the clipboard. Can you try copying something else?
